p: The R 0 in the 85 municipalities ranked from 1.11 in Floridablanca (Department of Santander) to 9.53 in the municipality of El Molino (La Guajira department). Most of the municipalities were estimated to have a one-week serial interval rather than a two-week serial interval ( S1 Fig). The distribution of R 0 values estimated are given in S2 Fig. Estimates of R 0 ranged from 1 to 9, where over 76% of municipalities had R 0 values between 1 and 2. When we looked at the distribution of R 0, the cumulative proportions were 20% with R 0>2, 14% with R 0>3, and 9% with R 0>4.
